titleStmt.title: The Lords spiritual and temporal in the High Court of Parliament assembled, do hereby require every member of this house, not to grant any protection or protections (during this present session of Parliament) to any person or persons that are not, or shall not be their lordships menial servants ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

titleStmt.title: The Lords spiritual and temporal in the High Court of Parliament assembled, do hereby require every member of this house, not to grant any protection or protections (during this present session of Parliament) to any person or persons that are not, or shall not be their lordships menial servants ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 6 lines of text.
At head of title: Die Jovis 24 ÌŠMartii 1663.
"Ordered by the Lords spiritual and temporal in the High Court of Parliament assembled, that this order be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Browne, cleric. Parliamentorum."
